meanings.definition: Used to attract attention or express surprise or greeting.
meanings.sent2: Hulloo, my friend! How are you today?
meanings.sent3: Hulloo! I didn't expect to see you here.
meanings.sent4: Hulloo echoed through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent5: With a loud hulloo, she caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: To call out or shout loudly.
meanings.sent1: He hullooed for help when he got lost.
meanings.sent2: The coach hullooed instructions to the players.
meanings.sent3: The children hullooed with joy as they played outside.
meanings.sent4: She hullooed across the field to get her dog's attention.
meanings.sent5: The ranger hullooed to scare away the bears.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of greeting or surprise.
meanings.sent1: Hulloo! I didn't see you there.
meanings.sent3: Hulloo! You scared me with that sudden appearance.
meanings.sent4: The hulloo of the crowd filled the stadium.
meanings.sent5: With a hulloo, the party began in full swing.
